content: make it easier working 2 rounds together - more difficult but creates a stretchier fish/hat opening 1 knit as directed until piece is about 1 5 long 2 let the stockinette brim roll over to what seems like a natural position what you are going to do now is work 2 stitches together one from the needle and picking one up from the rolled stockinette portion so you can force the lips to stay where you want them to 3 work a sw knit and turn the work take a small needle i like a little wooden cable needle and pick up the leg of the stitch on the stockinette roll you want to work now go through the first stitch on the needle then through the stitch held on your little cable needle and knit them together repeat this all the way around to the bor marker make sure as you are picking up legs on the rolled portion that you try to stay in the same line 4 when you reach the bor marker slip the marker the next stitch will be the sw you made earlier knit it as one stitch 5 knit the remainder of the round 6 change to mouth color yarn and begin working the mouth preparing the mouth - using mouth color yarn prep round a knit prep round b sl-1 * knit * to make it easier to find the spot for your short row on the 2nd side of the mouth as you work the next round place a distinctive mid-round marker after 44 stitches prep round c knit shaping the first side of the mouth row 1 k5 sw turn sw on knit stitch - use tip of right needle to lift up right leg of 1st stitch on left needle & knit it move this new knitted stitch back to left needle row 2 p10 sw turn sw on purl stitch - slip_stitch to right needle without working it lift collar of slipped stitch onto left needle and purl it move both lifted purled stitch & unworked original stitch back to left needle on the row above you will be making the sw in the stitch right after you work the previously made sw as one stitch row 3 k11 sw turn on the row above you will be making the sw in the stitch right after you work the previously made sw as one stitch row 4 p12 sw turn on the row above you will be making the sw in the stitch right after you work the previously made sw as one stitch row 5 k13 sw turn on the row above you will be making the sw in the stitch right after you work the previously made sw as one stitch row 6 p14 sw turn on the row above you will be making the sw in the stitch right after you work the previously made sw as one stitch hat #43 fish adult size v1
